wikipedia_page.main:
Jefferson Davis Cohn (1881–1951) was a British American publisher and horse breeder. He was the godson of Jefferson Davis.In 1914, he bought Teddy from Edmond Blanc for 5,400 francs. Cohn also owned Haras du Bois-Roussel, a breeding farm in Alençon, which he sold to Léon Volterra.
He was married firstly to Florence, daughter of the Member of Parliament, financier and swindler Horatio Bottomley, and secondly, in 1921, to Marcelle Chantal.
